name: Deceitful Drone
description:
This Little Puzzle-Platformer is about a deceitful drone trying to get you to... well, deceive you, by giving you inaccurate instructions.

-- HTML5 version has some sound issues while switching scenes --

This game is a submission for the Brakeys Gamejam 2022.1, with the theme: It is not real.
For this jam I tried to focus more on how my game looked, played and sounded, rather than an innovative mechanic, but it has some story by means of fun dialogue. It fits in to the theme because the drone is deceiving you AKA not telling what is real. The ending also fits in but that's a spoiler.

There are also 2 secrets, let me know if you find any!
